root.name: CABAL Online
root.description: HistoryCabal launched in North America and Southeast Asia on March 3 2008.ClassesWarriorThe warriors starting area is Bloody Ice.They have high defence and high attack.However, unlike other MMORPGS, they do not have high hp. A warrior mainly uses a great sword or a 2-handed daikatana.Due to the fact that they are easy to use, Warriors are normally recommended to beginners.BladerForce ShielderForce BladerWizardForce Archer
